page.title: 19LUNAN, LIFE STYLES.
page.content:
Having your own transport for shopping,visiting the doctor etc. is a great asset in this area, for it is often very difficult , especially in winter, to get up to the main road to catch the bus.
There appears to be no emergency provision from the urban areas to check up on the elderly in rural areas during severe winter weather. Some, although loving the area, dread the winter, especially after the winter of 1984, when many could not get up to the bus stop. Unable to light their fires through frozen pipes with their food stocks running low they were glad of the help they received from neighbours but would rather not have to rely wholly on them.
